subject: [Radiance-general] Another rpiece question
body:
One clarification on this. While rpiece does manage calling rpict, you
DO need to call rpiece for however many jobs you want to run on your
machine. Thus if you have 4 cores on the machine you would fire off 4
copies of the rpiece command line.

-Jack

Jack de Valpine wrote:

--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
